body_html: There's also the recompute_grad decorator now. And Grappler does some swapping to host memory by default. But yes, it'd be nice if Grappler's memory optimizer did checkpointing automatically keeping device memory constraints in mind. (But unfortunately I have no immediate plans to work on it.)
